about_the_game:
After 10 years of his father's sudden disappearance, John Bush receives a letter telling him to go to his dad's old costume factory. Without even thinking twice, John gets in his car and goes to the abandoned place.

However, when he least expects it, he discovers the place is full of lunatics using the costumes to portray an feral version of those characters. But at this point, nothing would get in john's way, not right now.

Game characteristics

• Explore through 4 different areas, all belonging to a different in-game franchise that belonged to John's Father's business partners. These areas being:

Stardust

A laser tag franchise. Where a robot lies, wating for your arrival.

Finds

A foreing language course. So learn your spanish before you vanish.

Royal Burguers

A fast-food franchise. The queen might be cruel, but worse is the one above her.

Frightown

A scape-room franchise. Beware the lurking wendigo;

• Fight against a horde of Mascots ranging up to 20 different ones, with each one having different strengths and weakness;

• Find collectables to discover more of the criptic lore behind the game;

• Pet the doggie : )

In this world, you can lose everything you have but your mind. For then, and only then, all is over.

content_descriptors.notes: Explicit gore on player's death, going from multilation to decapitation.

detailed_description:
After 10 years of his father's sudden disappearance, John Bush receives a letter telling him to go to his dad's old costume factory. Without even thinking twice, John gets in his car and goes to the abandoned place.

However, when he least expects it, he discovers the place is full of lunatics using the costumes to portray an feral version of those characters. But at this point, nothing would get in john's way, not right now.

Game characteristics

• Explore through 4 different areas, all belonging to a different in-game franchise that belonged to John's Father's business partners. These areas being:

Stardust

A laser tag franchise. Where a robot lies, wating for your arrival.

Finds

Royal Burguers

A fast-food franchise. The queen might be cruel, but worse is the one above her.

Frightown

A scape-room franchise. Beware the lurking wendigo;

• Fight against a horde of Mascots ranging up to 20 different ones, with each one having different strengths and weakness;

• Find collectables to discover more of the criptic lore behind the game;

• Pet the doggie : )

In this world, you can lose everything you have but your mind. For then, and only then, all is over.
name: PseudoSanity

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bits
  • Processor: 64 bits
  • Memory: 1500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon(TM) RX Vega 11 Graphics
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64 bits
  • Processor: 64 bits
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 280
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Temas sensíveis
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: Fight multiple monsters at once while uncovering the mysteries of your missing father. Solve puzzles and find more weapons, but most importantly, try not to fall insane.
supported_languages:
English, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support
